plot: When Naboth of Jezreel refuses to sell his vineyard to King Ahab of Israel, Jezebel schemes a plot to kill him.
title: Lego Ahab and Jezebel
plot_es: When Naboth of Jezreel refuses to sell his vineyard to King Ahab of Israel, Jezebel schemes a plot to kill him.
plot_en: When Naboth of Jezreel refuses to sell his vineyard to King Ahab of Israel, Jezebel schemes a plot to kill him.
